Label: MTF1
Comment: Metal-response element-binding transcription factor-1 (MTF-1) functions as a cellular zinc sensor which coordinates the expression of genes involved in zinc homeostasis.

Label: SLC39A1
Comment: SLC39A1 (ZIP1) transporter is responsible for the influx of zinc into the cytoplasm

Label: MT1A
Comment: zinc is chelated by cytoplasmic proteins, such as MTs

Comment: SLC30A1 (ZnT1) transporter is responsible of zinc efflux
